import React,{useState,useRef} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import Bg from '../assets/bg.png' import './Home.scss' const Home = () => { const [errors, setErrors] = useState([]) const [values, setValues] = useState({ email:'', password:'', cpassword:'', fullname:'', phone:'', }) const inputs=[ { id:1, name:"email", type:'email', label:'Email', required:true, }, { id:2, name:"password", type:'password', label:'Password', required:true, errorMessage:'should be 8-20 characters and should include at least 1 lettter, 1 number and 1 special character!', pattern:` ^(?=.*\d)(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*[a-zA-Z]).{8,20}$ ` }, { id:3, name:"cpassword", type:'password', label:'Confirrm Password', required:true, errorMessage:'Passwords don\'t match!', pattern:values.password }, { id:4, name:"fullname", type:'text', label:'Fullname', errorMessage:'Full Name should be 12-20 characters!' }, { id:5, name:"phone", type:'tel', label:'Phone Number', pattern:"\d{1,9}", errorMessage:'Should contain only Numbers!' } ] const ref = useRef() const handleSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() } const onChange=(e)=>{ setValues({...values,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } const [focused, setFocused] = useState(false) const handleFocus=(e)=>{ setFocused(true) } console.log(values) return (

Choose a date range

{ inputs.map((item)=>(
item.name === "cpassword" && setFocused(true)} onBlur={handleFocus} value={values[item.name]} onChange={onChange} focused={focused.toString()} /> {item.errorMessage}
)) }

) } export default Home
